Title: Salamander Catalytic Water Conditioner 3/4" BSP Single Point 24-54L/min CWCOND03
Description:
Salamander Pumps Water Conditioners offer single point or whole house water supply treatment, they prevent limescale build-up, protecting your household appliances including a shower pump.

Salamander Catalytic Water Conditioners use an alloy core which changes the Calcium Carbonate from Calcite to Aragonite, there are no chemicals or salt in this process meaning that the water is also safe to drink.

Key Features
Single point or whole house water supply treatment,
Prevent limescale build-up,
Do not use chemicals or salt,
Easy to install in any orientation,
Compact design,
Environmentally friendly,
Maintenance free – no ongoing running costs,
No electrical power required,
10-year warranty, with an average lifespan of 15 years.
 

The Water Conditioner 330x35mm has been designed to offer whole house water supply treatment. The Water Conditioner has been manufactured with ¾” BSP tapered threads at each end allowing the installer to select the correct connection to their in-coming water supply.

The Water Conditioner 330x35mm has been designed to work with flow rates of between 24 and 54 L/min and has a flow direction arrow engraved, for ease of installation for installers.

All Salamander Pumps Water Conditioners can be installed both vertically and/or horizontally.
